actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution to designate the room No. S-120 in the U.S. Capitol as the Alben W. Barkley Room.

summary.text: Designates the room located in the United States Capitol and designed as number S-120 as the "Alben W. Barkley Room". Directs the committee on Rules and Administration to place an appropriate marker or inscription at any suitable location with respect to such room to commemorate and designate such room as provided in this resolution.

titles.title: A resolution to designate the room No. S-120 in the U.S. Capitol as the Alben W. Barkley Room.
